meanings.definition: A small, unimportant or insignificant person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The weenie in the story was a tiny mouse.
meanings.sent2: I ate a weenie for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The weenie of a pencil was lost in the big box.
meanings.sent4: His weenie of a car struggled to climb the hill.
meanings.sent5: The weenie plant barely reached the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A hot dog or sausage, especially a small one.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious weenies.
meanings.sent2: I grilled some weenies for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The weenie was sizzling on the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: She loved putting ketchup on her weenie.
meanings.sent5: The weenie was the perfect size for a quick snack.

meanings.definition: To act in a cowardly or timid manner.
meanings.sent1: Don't weenie out of trying new things.
meanings.sent2: He tends to weenie when faced with challenges.
meanings.sent3: She weenied her way out of the haunted house.
meanings.sent4: The cat weenied away from the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent5: I won't weenie when it comes to standing up for what's right.
